title: Northwell Health CEO Prepared for Second Wave
itunes:title: Northwell Health CEO Prepared for Second Wave
description:
Michael Dowling, CEO at Northwell Health, discusses how the hospital system is handling COVID-19. He says they have gotten better at treating patients and are prepared if a second wave of the virus hits in the fall.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
